main event: A bluish white meteoritic object was observed and reported over Port Townsend, Washington on 30 May 1952.
interesting points: The observation was made at 12:30 a.m. PST,The object was described as a ball of fire that exploded,This sighting is similar to another meteor explosion reported on 11 May,The object was seen by a state cop over Fort Townsend,The report indicates that astronomers classified it as a meteor.
